subject: Re:
content:
Inder ji, Please don’t worry  about the work. Take full rest. You are entitled to medical leave. Did you use Insurance for your operation. 

Please check with Anushree. 



> On 26 Apr 2025, at 17:31, Inder Dev Bansal <inder.bansal@nxfin.in> wrote:
> 
> ﻿
> Good evening sir
> 
> Yesterday evening again my same eye surgery happened.they put gas in my eye to make clear vision. I was facing problem since cataract surgery. Dr said u have to lie down on bad straight without pillow for a week to become alright.
> 
> So plz allow me to handle my all work from home for a week.
> 
> Thanks regards
